name: Mystery of Deep Forest Deer Hunting
name_original: Mystery of Deep Forest Deer Hunting
description:
Mystery of Deep Forest Deer Hunting

Aim and Shoot!
Do you Want's to be a Hunter. Hunt the white tail wild Deer,Choose your favorite different sniper from weapon factory and kill the deer in one shot.
Enjoy endless customization as you perfect your weapons. Upgrade magazines, scopes, stocks, barrels and more! Take hunting to the next level!

You have to Run behind these animals and hunt them & survivor for given time period and complete your target.
In Next we provide you different animals like dino, rhino, elephant, bear, Wild goat, big pig, fox, wolf.
If you want to know the hunting thrill in jungle then must play this game.In this game the jungle graphic used for your children entertainment.

There are different kinds of deer in the world, and, most deer are similar in shape, size and gender.
The simple deer game we are offering is to shoot and hunt the caribou, the Chital will move around, and when they come in the center of your gun's aim, shoot them with accuracy.

You have to shoot more, collect them and count the most score you have been hunting in a spell. Your suggestion would be our great pleasure for the improvement and addition of near features time to time.
Hunting skill is require for hunting in deep forest.
Download this game and fill real Wild safari Hunting adventure.
